total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that in the examples, the 5th and 6th columns from the left and the 15th and 16th columns from the right are changed to 0 in the output grid.
Q3: Determine if this pattern applies to all rows in the input grid.
Q4: Apply this pattern to the input grid of the quiz, changing the 5th and 6th columns from the left and the 15th and 16th columns from the right to 0.
Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that in the examples, the 15th and 16th columns of the input grid are replaced with 0s in the output grid.
Q3: Determine if this pattern of replacing the 15th and 16th columns with 0s applies to all rows in the input grid.
Q4: Apply this pattern to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
